lead_paragraph: ROSENFELD--Leonard, at the age of 97, died peacefully surrounded by family and friends Sunday, February 21, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Sally, devoted brother of the late Morton, loving uncle of Regina and MayLisa and their husbands Derek and John, cherished great-uncle of Casey, her loving husband Jeremy, Kylie, Gabrielle and Rachel, proud great-granduncle of Gavin and Spencer and honorary uncle to Michael. The family will hold private services. In lieu of flowers, donations to Temple Emanu-El, One East 65th Street, New York, NY 10065, would be appreciated. 1/3
